### CreateColumnMajorLoad() {#ae5881267e88ebfd0527460a92b61f960}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CallInst &#42; llvm::MatrixBuilder::CreateColumnMajorLoad (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; EltTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; DataPtr, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Stride, bool IsVolatile, unsigned Rows, unsigned Columns, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Name=&quot;&quot;)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a column major, strided matrix load.

<code>EltTy</code> - Matrix element type <code>DataPtr</code> - Start address of the matrix read <code>Rows</code> - Number of rows in matrix (must be a constant) <code>Columns</code> - Number of columns in matrix (must be a constant) <code>Stride</code> - Space between columns

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/matrixbuilder-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/matrixbuilder-h">MatrixBuilder.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Create a column major, strided matrix store.

<code>Matrix</code> - Matrix to store <code>Ptr</code> - Pointer to write back to <code>Stride</code> - Space between columns

### CreateScalarDiv() {#a3262fd98083596d5b011272638ac69a3}

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Divide matrix <code>LHS</code> by scalar <code>RHS</code>.

If the operands are integers, <code>IsUnsigned</code> indicates whether UDiv or SDiv should be used.
